We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private TrueRange _tr;
// In Initialize()
_tr = TR(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TR Is Ready", _tr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TR Warm Up Period", _tr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TR Current", _tr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TR Name", _tr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TR Samples", _tr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.tr = self.TR(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TR Is Ready", self.tr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TR Warm Up Period", self.tr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TR Current", self.tr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TR Name", self.tr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TR Samples", self.tr.Samples);
